title: Effect of proanthocyanidin and riboflavin associated with dimethyl sulfoxide in eroded dentine: Six-year in vitro evaluation.
abstract: To evaluate the effect of crosslinking agents combined with dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) on collagen crosslinking, long-term bond strength and interfacial integrity of a universal adhesive applied to eroded dentine.
journal: Dental materials : official publication of the Academy of Dental Materials
